name: Erya's Chronicles
description:
Erya's Chronicles

An unnamed girl wakes up, her eyes full of a desire to live...

--------

Erya's Chronicles is a short game prototype that I developed on GBStudio for Christmas 2020 !!! It's a small gift that I made with my small skills... I hope that you'll enjoy playing it few minutes !

--------

Controls:

X: Jump
Z: Attack & Interact
Arrow Keys: Move

Note: It seems to work with Xbox One controllers !

--------

version 1.0
